pr_title: chat-history: fix plugin not clearing history

timeline.bodyText: Perhaps menuOption.endsWith(CLEAR_HISTORY) to be more explicit?
timeline.author: Nightfirecat

replies.bodyText: I almost did this, but contains seemed "safer" if jagex changes this. I'll use .endsWith tho. It's a quick fix anyway.
replies.author: while-loop
